nodes.text: The Nintendo Switch is the seventh video game console made by Nintendo, following the Nintendo Entertainment System, Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Nintendo 64, Nintendo GameCube, Wii and Wii U. It is the successor of the Wii U and the sixth handheld by Nintendo, following the Game Boy, Game Boy Color, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS, and Nintendo 3DS. It functions as both a handheld and a home console. Games can be purchased as physical copies or on the Nintendo eShop.
